OSPAnimator

Class ShapeAnimObject

  • java.lang.Object
    • OSPAnimator.AnimObject
      • OSPAnimator.ShapeAnimObject
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IAnimObject

    public class ShapeAnimObject
extends AnimObject
    Shape anim. objek predstavuje tvar, ktory je mozne animovat. Menenie tvaru v tomto objekte zrusi vycentrovanie. Vycentrovanie tvaru sa zaruci zavolanim metody body().centerBoundsOnPoint(0, 0) na instanci tohoto anim. objektu. Anim. objekty pracuju v lokal. suradnicovom systeme. Lokalna pozicia 0,0 predstavuje globalnu poziciu anim. objektu.

    • Field Summary

      • curveTo

        public void curveTo(double x1,
                    double y1,
                    double x2,
                    double y2,
                    double x3,
                    double y3)
        Okamzita aktivita na : Add a curved segment, defined by three new points, to this path node by drawing a BÃ©zier curve that intersects both the current coordinates and the specified coordinates (x3,y3), using the specified points (x1,y1) and (x2,y2) as BÃ©zier control points. All coordinates are specified in double precision.
        Parameters:
        x1 - x coordinate of the first BÃ©zier control point
        y1 - y coordinate of the first BÃ©zier control point
        x2 - x coordinate of the second BÃ©zier control point
        y2 - y coordinate of the second BÃ©zier control point
        x3 - x coordinate of the final end point
        y3 - y coordinate of the final end point

      • quadTo

        public void quadTo(double x1,
                   double y1,
                   double x2,
                   double y2)
        Okamzita aktivita na : Add a curved segment, defined by two new points, to this path node by drawing a Quadratic curve that intersects both the current coordinates and the specified coordinates (x2,y2), using the specified point (x1,y1) as a quadratic parametric control point. All coordinates are specified in double precision.
        Parameters:
        x1 - x coordinate of the quadratic control point
        y1 - y coordinate of the quadratic control point
        x2 - x coordinate of the final end point
        y2 - y coordinate of the final end point
